meanings.definition: A polygon with five sides and five angles.
meanings.sent1: I drew colorful pentagons in my art class.
meanings.sent2: The playground had a structure with pentagons all around.
meanings.sent3: The pentagons on the math test seemed to be dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace was adorned with shiny pentagons, like little treasures.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in a carpet of vibrant pentagons, creating a mesmerizing pattern.

meanings.definition: A shape with five straight sides and five angles.
meanings.sent1: The logo of the company featured pentagons in a unique design.
meanings.sent2: The soccer ball was made up of black and white pentagons.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with colorful pentagons, making it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The building's architecture incorporated pentagons, giving it a modern feel.
meanings.sent5: The kite soared high in the sky, its tail fluttering with pentagons of various colors.
